title: Pittsburgh Trendquins 8/9: Serena Williams, Civil War, Fred Savage, Lamont Dozier, NBA, Catholicism
itunes:title: Pittsburgh Trendquins 8/9: Serena Williams, Civil War, Fred Savage, Lamont Dozier, NBA, Catholicism
description:
In this edition of Pittsburgh Trendquins, Jack and Miles discuss Serena Williams announcing her retirement, a post-Trump Raid Boogaloo Boi  check-in, Fred Savage getting booted from the new 'Wonder Years' set for "erratic behavior", the passing of Lamont Dozier, NBA news, and "New Yorks' Hottest Club" being the Catholic church?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
